short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily search bookmarks and explore multiple AI engines with one key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Bookmark Management Made Effortless — Now with AI Search & Keyboard-Only Support!

Are you drowning in a sea of bookmarks and struggling to find the page you need? Do you feel like your bookmarks are gathering dust instead of helping you? It’s time to take control of your browsing experience with this powerful Chrome extension — now more efficient than ever!

🔍 Lightning-Fast Bookmark Search
Search through your bookmarks in the blink of an eye! No more scrolling endlessly or hunting down that one elusive link. Simply click the extension icon and instantly search across all your saved bookmarks — everything right at your fingertips!

📊 Smart Organization for Effortless Access
Our extension brings you three powerful modules designed to make bookmarking easy and intuitive:

"Pinned Sites": Keep your favorite sites front and center. You can drag and drop to reorder, remove unwanted sites, or customize it however you like. We've also pre-loaded popular sites to help you get started!
"Frequently Used": Automatically displays your 10 most visited sites, saving you time and clicks. Efficiency at its best!
"Recently Added": Instantly access your 10 most recently saved bookmarks. Never lose track of the pages you’ve just discovered!
🎨 Personalized Bookmark Bar
Tweak the "Pinned Sites" section to suit your needs. Organize, reorder, and remove items with ease. Create the perfect bookmark bar that makes browsing as smooth as possible.

✨ New AI Search Feature: Supercharge Your Browsing
Looking for something specific but can’t find it in your bookmarks? Press Enter to instantly search multiple AI-powered search engines. It’s like having a personal AI assistant right within your bookmark manager, helping you search beyond the bookmarks and into the vast world of information.

⌨️ Pure Keyboard Efficiency
Navigating and managing your bookmarks has never been faster or more seamless. This extension supports keyboard-only navigation, so you can quickly toggle the extension with a shortcut, use the arrow keys to scroll through your bookmarks, and press Enter to open them — all without touching your mouse. A smooth, keyboard-driven experience designed for efficiency.

Goodbye chaotic bookmarks, hello a smarter, faster way to browse! Let this extension be your ultimate tool for staying organized and saving time. Whether you’re a power user or just looking to simplify your online life, this extension is your ticket to a more efficient, enjoyable browsing experience.

Try it now and transform the way you manage your bookmarks!

书签管理从未如此轻松！— 现已支持AI搜索 & 完全键盘操作！

是否总是被成千上万的书签淹没，寻找需要的网页时苦不堪言？觉得存下的书签越来越没用，反而成了负担？现在，是时候告别这些烦恼，体验这款强大的Chrome插件，让您的浏览体验变得前所未有的高效！

🔍 闪电般的书签搜索
只需点击插件图标，便能瞬间搜索所有保存的书签，告别无尽的滚动和筛选。您想要的书签，随时触手可得！

📊 智能分类，让访问更高效
插件为您带来三大模块，帮助您快速找到所需内容：

"置顶网站"：将您最爱的站点常驻首页，支持自定义排序、删除不需要的链接，还可以根据需要调整，您喜欢的样子就是最好的样子！我们也为您预加载了一些热门站点，助您快速启动。
"经常使用"：自动显示您最近访问的10个书签，让您快速跳转到最常用的网站。
"最近添加"：展示您最近保存的10个书签，轻松回顾您关注的新鲜内容，快速再次访问。
🎨 个性化书签栏
"置顶网站"模块可自由调整，支持拖拽排序、删除无用站点，打造专属于您的理想书签栏。

✨ 全新AI搜索功能：让浏览更智能
在查找书签时，如果没有找到您想要的，按下 Enter 键，插件将自动跨多个AI搜索引擎进行搜索，像是拥有一个私人AI助手，帮您快速找到所需的信息！无论书签中没有，还是您想更深层次的探索，AI搜索为您提供无尽可能。

⌨️ 纯键盘操作，极致高效
不仅如此，这款插件还完全支持键盘操作！通过快捷键打开插件，使用上下键选择书签，再按下回车键快速访问，无需用鼠标，完全依赖键盘即可轻松完成所有操作。快速、流畅、无缝连接，让您的操作更高效。

告别杂乱无序的书签管理，告别浪费时间的浏览方式！让这款插件成为您高效管理书签、提升浏览体验的得力助手。无论是高级用户，还是只想简化网络生活的朋友，这款插件都能为您带来全新的浏览体验！

立即下载，开启您的智能书签之旅！
long.de,fr,hi,it,ja,sk,zh_TW:
Bookmark Management Made Effortless!
Are you tired of sifting through countless bookmarks to find the webpage you need? Do you feel like your saved bookmarks rarely see the light of day? Say goodbye to those frustrations with this powerful Chrome extension!
🔍 Lightning-Fast Search: With just a click on the extension icon, instantly search through all your saved bookmarks. No more endless scrolling through your bookmark bar – everything is at your fingertips!
📊 Intelligent Organization: Our extension features three core modules designed for your convenience:

"Pinned Sites": Keep your favorite websites within easy reach. Customize, reorder, and delete as you please. We've also pre-selected some popular sites to get you started!
"Frequently Used": Smart display of your 10 most visited bookmarks, putting efficiency at your fingertips.
"Recently Added": Showcases your 10 most recently saved bookmarks, helping you easily revisit your latest interests.

🎨 Personal Touch: Tailor the "Pinned Sites" module to your liking. Drag and drop to reorder, remove unwanted sites, and create the perfect bookmark bar that suits your needs.
Bid farewell to the era of chaotic bookmark management. Let this extension be your trusted companion in the digital world. Manage with ease, access with speed, and make your online life more efficient and enjoyable!
Install now and embark on your smart bookmarking journey!
书签管理从未如此轻松！
还在为海量书签中寻找所需网页而苦恼吗？是否觉得存了那么多书签，却很少派上用场？现在，有了这款强大的Chrome插件，您的烦恼将一扫而空！
🔍 闪电搜索：只需点击插件图标，即刻搜索您保存的所有书签。再也不用在书签栏中苦苦寻觅，一切尽在指尖！
📊 智能分类：插件为您精心打造三大核心模块：

"置顶网站"：将您最爱的网站随手可及，支持自定义排序和删除。我们还为您精选了一些热门网站，助您开启网上冲浪之旅！
"经常使用"：智能呈现您最常访问的10个书签，让效率触手可及。
"最近添加"：展示最新保存的10个书签，让您轻松回顾近期关注的内容。

🎨 个性定制：您可以自由调整"置顶网站"模块，拖拽排序、删除不需要的网站，打造专属于您的理想书签栏。
告别杂乱无章的书签管理时代，让这款插件成为您网络世界的得力助手。轻松管理、快速访问，让您的网络生活更加高效愉悦！
立即安装，开启您的智能书签之旅！
